channel.title: Projects on aron online!
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on aron online!

item.title: keyboard
item.description: these days, a significant portion of human uptime is spent on a screen, whether it be for work, academia, or even leisure. over the past year i’ve taken an interest in optimizing my online efficiency to reduce the time i need to spend online. i reckoned with this by attempting to master the devices that are responsible for bridging the interactional gap between us and our computers: keyboards. improving my typing speed seemed like an obvious first step.

item.title: materials
item.description: originally written in december 2021 for my materials class in the fall 2021 semester, students were assigned the task of designing and conducting a semester-long lab experiment to test the mechanical properties of a material of our choosing. due to my newfound obsession with keyboards, i decided to test thermoplastics, as they are commonly used in keyboard switches. ultimately, it was a valuable first foray into engineering lab experience. being able to interface with genuine lab equipment and use real data to write a scientific paper was a pretty fulfilling experience.
